userNote.userText: 11:11 JOANNA CALLED FROM BRANCH -REQ COPY OF POLICY THIS WAS TO BE NON RENEWED-074 EMAIL TO HER AT JMARON@NJAC.AAA.COM 908 757 7017 BCHOCOLATE2@MSN.COM 11:24 S/W BARBARA CONFUSED ABOUT THE RENEWAL/EFT TOOK A PAYMENT 074- AGENCY GAVE HER AMERICAN COMMERCE POLICY ADV INCREASE WAS BASED ON AFA FOR HUSBAND S/W JOSH FROM UW ADV THAT SINCE WE DIDNT SEND OUT NRN AND SHE'S ACCEPTED THE OFFER ON RENEWAL PER EFT, WE KEEP ON IT FOR THE NEXT YEAR 8/5/13. JLEMONDS. REFERRAL RCVD CALL FROM DAWN IN SVC, WHO INQD ABOUT WHETHER NON-RENEWAL NOTICE WAS SENT OUT. THE CLUB IS TERMINATING CONTRACT W/US, AND IS NON- RENEWING MOST AUTO POLICIES DUE TO THIS. HOWEVER, NO RECORD OF THIS BEING SENT TO INSD, NOR OF NTBR BEING SET. WE HAVE ALREADY SENT RENEWAL OFFER, AND INSD HAS ACCEPTED. THEREFORE WE MUST HONOR POLICY FOR THIS TERM UNLESS INSD REQ TO CXL IT.
